pkgmetadata.longdescription: Common and Individual Structure Explained for Multiple Graphs // Specific dimension reduction methods for replicated graphs (multiple undirected graphs repeatedly measured on a common set of nodes). The package contains efficient procedures for estimating a shared baseline propensity matrix and graph- specific low rank matrices. The algorithm uses block coordinate descent algorithm to solve the model, which alternatively performs L2-penalized logistic regression and multiple partial eigenvalue decompositions, as described in the paper Wang et al. (2017) arXiv:1707.06360.
